name: Maze Dungeon: Labyrinth Game, Maze Puzzle Game
name_original: Maze Dungeon: Labyrinth Game, Maze Puzzle Game
description:
Maze Dungeon is a path or collection of paths, typically from an entrance to a goal.
Roll the cube through the labyrinth game.
Use swipes of buttons to drive the cube out labyrinths.

  • Explore and find a way out of more than 30 different labyrinths.
  • Collect skills points
  • Upgrade cube abilities
  • The game gets hard after the initial levels.
  • Enjoy Maze Dungeon Labyrinth game for free
